name: Gina Myers
bio:
Gina Myers is the author of the full-length collections A Model Year (2009) and Hold It Down (2013), as well as several chapbooks including Philadelphia (2017). Her essays and reviews have appeared in Hyperallergic, Fanzine, Frontier Psychiatrist, Coldfront Magazine, The Rumpus, and other places. From 2005 to 2016 she edited Lame House Press, which published handmade chapbooks by emerging and established poets. She currently coedits the tiny with Gabriella Torres.
 
Originally from Saginaw, Michigan, Myers lives in Philadelphia where she runs the Accidental Player reading series.
